insert.selectKey: select nvl(sum(pay_price),0) price from pacch_payment where user_no = #{userNo}

mapper.select: select card_point from pacch_membershipinfo where user_no = #{userNo}

select m.*,c.*,to_char(m.user_birth,'yyyy')||'년'||to_char(m.user_birth,'MM')||'월'||to_char(m.user_birth,'dd')||'일' strBirth from pacch_member m left outer join (select card_no,card_date,card_point,g.* from pacch_membershipinfo i join (select user_No userNo,membg_price,discount_percent,discount_name from PACCH_MEMBERSHIPGRADE p join PACCH_MEMBERSHIPDISCOUNT d on p.DISCOUNT_CODE = d.DISCOUNT_CODE) g on i.user_no = g.userNo) c on c.userNo = m.user_no where m.user_no = #{userNo}

select service_no serviceNo,to_char(service_date,'yyyy/MM/dd') serviceDate,service_title serviceTitle,service_content serviceContent,service_kindof serviceKindof,reply_check replyCheck from pacch_service where user_no = #{userNo} and isshow != 'N'

select us.service_no serviceNo,service_kindof serviceKindof,service_title serviceTitle,to_char(service_date,'yyyy/MM/dd') serviceDate,service_content serviceContent,comment_writer commentWriter,to_char(comment_date,'yyyy/MM/dd') commentDate, comment_content commentContent from (select * from pacch_service where service_no = #{serviceNo}) us join pacch_servicecomment c on us.service_no = c.service_no
select serviceimg_Path serviceimgPath from pacch_serviceimg where service_no = #{serviceNo}
mapper.update: update pacch_member set user_nick = #{changeNick} where user_no = #{userNo}
update pacch_member set user_profile = #{profileName} where user_no = #{userNo}
mapper.select: select * from(select rownum,movie_name movieName,movie_code movieCode,movie_poster moviePoster from pacch_movie where isshow = 'Y' order by DBMS_RANDOM.value) where rownum = 1
